sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './CartModal.css'; export default function CartModal(props) { const { cartItems, onClose, removeFromCart, handleIncrease, handleDecrease, totalAmount } = props; return (

SHOPPING CART

{cartItems.length > 0 ? ( cartItems.map((item, index) => (

{item.title}

£{(item.price * (item.quantity || 1)).toFixed(2)}

{(item.quantity || 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}

)) ) : (

No products available

)}

SUBTOTAL:

£ {totalAmount.toFixed(2)}
); }
